titleStmt.title: Messire Thomas Edmondes, cheualier, conseiller au conseil d'etat de treshaut, tresexcellent, & trespuissant Prince Iaques ...
titleStmt.author: Edmondes, Thomas, Sir, 1563?-1639.

notesStmt.note: Declaration of style and title as ambassador to the king of France.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
